content: Which famous Italian artist painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel between 1508 and 1512?

The famous Italian artist who painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel between 1508 and 1512 is Michelangelo Buonarroti, commonly known as Michelangelo. He was a renowned sculptor, painter, architect, and poet of the High Renaissance period. The Sistine Chapel ceiling is one of his most iconic works, featuring numerous scenes from the Book of Genesis, including the well-known depiction of the Creation of Adam, where God reaches out to touch Adam's finger.
